</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns array of all simple objects that belong to the listed class names. If the array of types is empty [], all simple objects are returned including those without class name.<br><br>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Informative</title><part><name index="1"/><value>
*There is no inheritance in simple objects, so only exact class match is allowed.
* ''className'' is not case sensitive.</value></part></template> </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[allSimpleObjects]] classes </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> classes: [[Array]] of [[String]]s - classnames array. Use <tt>[]</tt> to return all simple objects </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - array of [[createSimpleObject|simple objects]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[allSimpleObjects]] ["Box_NATO_Equip_F", "Land_CampingChair_V2_F"];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_allSimpleObjects = [[allSimpleObjects]] [];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
